channel.title: Instafashion; not receiving my order. What to do?
channel.description:
wattup guys. My girlfriend purchased some things on instafashion.com like two weeks ago and it hasn't showed up. Their email for customer service is fake, and they didn't email me an tracking number or nothing. What can I do? Is there anyway to take legal action? Here's a picture of the email sent when i purchased the order:
Order confirmation for order #1143‏ Thank you for placing your order with Instafashion! This email is to confirm your recent order. Date 05/01/2013 Shipping address Rodrigo Molina 70** Michigan Isle Rd Lake Worth, Florida 33*** United States Billing address Rodrigo Molina 70** Michigan Isle Rd Lake Worth, Florida 33*** United States 1x InstaFashion Bracelet Cross Golden Ball for $13.00 each 1x Instafashion Cross Earring's Gold & Silver - Silver for $11.00 each Subtotal : $24.00 USD FL State Tax : $0.86 USD Shipping : $3.30 USD Total : $28.16 USD

item.title: Instafashion; not receiving my order. What to do?

item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Fair enough, i suppose. I’m still a little hurt inside. ;(

item.source: Instafashion; not receiving my order. What to do?

item.title: Instafashion; not receiving my order. What to do?
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

jme:

Do what Niall said.

imthenull:

If contacting the store owners does you no good, report it to either your bank or credit card company.

Niall:

Report the charge as a fraudulent one to your bank or credit card company.

I love when my posts are ignored. ;(

Read full topic
item.source: Instafashion; not receiving my order. What to do?

item.title: Instafashion; not receiving my order. What to do?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Where is it coming from? If its coming from another country, it can be held at customs for a very long time no matter what speedy service you paid for.

Do what Niall said. And I know for sure if it was paid on a credit card, they will get the money back for you. If you used paypal, you need to make a claim asap (within 45 days of payment sent)

Read full topic
item.source: Instafashion; not receiving my order. What to do?

item.title: Instafashion; not receiving my order. What to do?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

First change your info, second report it to your card creator, third report the site to the FBI or even the ICCC.

https://www.ic3.gov/default.aspx

Read full topic
